content: उद्धा I. {c3c} <ab>P.</ab> <ab>Ved.</ab> {@--1@} To abandon or expose (an infant). {@--2@} To set up, erect, build. II. {c3c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To go or move upwards, rise (as the sun, dust &c.); यतो रजः पार्थिवमुज्जिहीते <ls>R. 13. 64</ls>; <ls>Mu. 4. 21</ls>; <ls>Bk. 18. 27</ls>; <ls>N. 22. 45</ls>, <ls n="N. 22.">55.</ls> {@--2@} To go away from, depart; उज्जिहानजीवितां <ls>Māl. 10.</ls> {@--3@} To raise; शिरसा यूपमुज्जिहीते <ls>Kāty.</ls> {@--4@} To throw up, knit (as eyebrows); <ls>Bk. 3. 47.</ls>
